title: Nude
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Fausto Pirandello [1899-1975], Rome, Italy, until November 1952 [1]; James H. Beal [1898-1987], Pittsburgh, PA [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1952.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 213 in "The 1952 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1952.
[2]. Mr. Beal purchased the painting from the International for $400 (as a gift for Carnegie Institute of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal.) Receipt of his check, dated November 13, 1952, was acknowledged by the Institute's Italian representative on November 21, 1952. The painting was accessioned on December 11, 1952. See copies of correspondence with Mr. Beal in curatorial file.
